channel.title: Trade Dupe Issue... no fix?!
channel.description:
ok so everybody has figured out that if you go into a trade...
you add an item... both ppl accept in the first window... 1 person accepts in the second window... and the other person accepts then declines really fast... then you are disconnected and you receive 2 of the original item.
i am using pwnscape source... i have been having this problem ever since i started using this source... i have put too much work into it to switch sources...
i have searched and searched for a solution, tried all that claim that they work... and none of them work.
i have made a temp. fix by deleting a part of the "declinetrade void" but when you decline a trade, all your trade items disappear, and you cant move... my players are getting frustrated with this.
plz help... i NEED a solution (we can work out a deal if it must come down to that)

item.title: Trade Dupe Issue... no fix?!
item.dc:creator: @birdman4657 birdman4657
item.description:
@birdman4657 wrote:

_™:

Put a timer between hitting accept and decline.

can you give an example plz

item.title: Trade Dupe Issue... no fix?!

@11167 wrote:

I tell the same thing to every person who asks this damn question:

Put a timer between hitting accept and decline.
